feature.description: blue colorscheme

feature.name: Display

and.name: Library
and.description: Library Is the collection of pictures.

or.name: Sort
or.description: Sort Different Sort criteria for collection

feature.name: ByName
feature.description: ByName Sorts collection by name alphabetically

feature.name: ByPlace
feature.description: ByPlace Sorts collection by place alphabetically

feature.name: ByTime
feature.description: ByTime Sorts collection by time

feature.name: ByInport
feature.description: ByInport Sorts collection by inport alphabetically

feature.name: ByFormat
feature.description: ByFormat Sorts collection by format alphabetically

feature.name: Search
feature.description: Search Searches the library for a specific picture

or.name: PictureInfo
or.description: Picture Information Contains all information about a picture

feature.name: Name
feature.description: Name Contains the name of a picture

feature.name: Place
feature.description: Place Contains the place information of a picture

feature.name: Time
feature.description: Time Contains information about the time when the picture was taken/created

feature.name: Format
feature.description: Format Information about whitch dataformat the picture is

and.name: DataInterface
and.description: DataInterface Handels the inport and export of pictures. Can also erease pictures from library or disk

or.name: Inport
or.description: Inport Handels the different inport possibilitys

feature.name: URL
feature.description: URL Inport from URL

feature.name: LANInport
feature.description: LANInport Inport from local area network

feature.name: BluetoothInport
feature.description: BluetoothInport Inport from Bluetooth

or.name: Export

feature.name: LANExport
feature.description: LANExport Export to local area network device

feature.name: BluetoothExport

and.name: Delete

feature.name: deletePic

feature.name: FromDisk
